评论详情: Sleeves are tight and material is a little cheap. Not what I was expecting
It's so pretty! A little stiff but very comfortable.

If you're a big girl don't even bother. I returned it immediately. The Sizing is completely off. I've bought dresses with similar measurements and they fit great. I'm a 38DD and it wouldn't even come close to zipping up.

评论概述: Cute dress not so great quality
评论详情: Dress is cute, quality not so great. Zipper broke and had to replace.

Got this for my daughter to use on Halloween. She went with her boyfriend as scream face from the scream movie. She is 16 and now it's more an "outfit" than a costume as she put it. She coupled it with a mask and corset and looked beautiful. It fit true to size and she was happy with it.

This worked great for my costume as a huge pumpkin head! It is cute enough to wear to go out as well to dinner or on a date! Very cute i love the choker around the neck part it isn't too tight but accentuates the dress! Very comfortable. It does not have any pockets though but most dresses dont.

I need so many more reasons to wear this dress. I got it for a halloween costume for work and loved that the length of it was suitable for work. It fell above my knees and I'm 5'11. The quality was amazing and I was so comfortable all day with the mesh and the main fabric. I got a size large and it was roomy in the waist for comfort but not too big. Felt super cute all day
Love this dress, the only thing is that it is a little tight around the neckline at first but you just gotta let it loosen up a bit! For reference, I just had a baby 2 months ago and I’m 5’8” and 220
Like the length, very demure . The color is🔥love it
The neckline is tight. I would size up to avoid discomfort with the neckline. Besides that the dress was perfect and looked great. The material wasn't rough, breathable and it has some stretch to it.

Good quality dress, the sheer fabric is sturdy and hasn't ripped after several wears. The sleeves are lightweight and comfy. I'm rather short, but the dress fell at the right length. If it came in an extra small I would have purchased it. The waist line is fairly straight, if you are petite, you may want to have the waist line taken in for a fitted look.

评论详情: The style and the dress are very beautiful but I had to return as it wasn't for my body type
